field.name: Keyword
field.definition: a word or short phrase that describes the news, event or opportunity

dos.practice: Use words or short phrases from the resource.
Use words or short phrases to express ideas and concepts not expressed in other fields
Each keyword or short phrase should focus on a single topic like plate tectonics or phases of the moon
Keywords can also include overarching conference names if the new, event or opportunity occurs of interest is occurring as part of a larger conference or workshop.

donts.practice: Do not repeat words from the description or other fields.

examples.practice: Keywords for a AS-1 Seismograph Workshop that occurs at the Northwest Regional NSTA would be 'Northwest Regional National Science Teachers Association (NSTA)' while the title would be AS-1 Seismograph Workshop.
For reports or proceedings, create keywords about major concepts covered like global warming or ocean salinity

otherPractice.practice: For each new keyword concept, make a separate entry.

otherPractice.header: Want to use special characters like ©, é, ñ or ê? Do this:
otherPractice.practice: Enter special characters and symbols using their entity references numbers. For the copyright symbol this means entering an ampersand symbol followed by the pound sign followed by the number 169 followed by a semicolon.

documentation.obligation: required metadata if parent tag is present
